name: Let The Block Drop
description:
Let the Block Drop is hard reaction driven game. This game has simple premise: you have to match platform and block colors, but as the speed increases, it becomes a real challenge to keep up with block speed. Play and compete with your friends who has fastest reaction and reach top of leader boards or unlock various block achievements. Block and enjoy.

Features:
● simple fast paced gameplay
● true reaction challenge
● leader boards
● achievements
